ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of ANTHONY DAVID PERL, of Vancouver, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc. to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Steven M. Cummings, effective April 21, 2008.
